title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.2 - Designation of the records access officer and records appeals officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.2 - Designation of the records access officer and records appeals officer

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner of the office (commissioner) is responsible for administering the

Freedom of Information Law and shall designate a records access officer who
may, in turn, designate assistant records access officers. The commissioner
shall also designate a records appeals officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
461.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
